name: Full Tilt! Pinball
description: This is the version that came with older versions of Windows
content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Pinball/pinball.exe
files:
- installer:
    filename: 3d_pinball_for_windows_-_space_cadet.exe
    url: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2qgtjp7lyegps1w/3d_pinball_for_windows_-_space_cadet.exe?dl=1
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: -s2
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
